com.redhat.rhn.manager.satellite
Interface Executor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigureBootstrapCommandTest.TestExecutor, ConfigureSatelliteCommandTest.TestExecutor, RestartCommandTest.TestExecutor, SystemCommandExecutor
public interface Executor

Executor - simple interface to describe a way to execute a generic command with the passed in arguments. No contract is specified about what is contained in the arguments.

Method Summary
 int execute(java.lang.String[] args)
          Execute any command with the passed in arguments.
 java.lang.String getLastCommandErrorMessage()
          Returns the error message captured during the last command executed.
 java.lang.String getLastCommandOutput()
          Returns the output captured during the last command executed.
 

Method Detail

execute

int execute(java.lang.String[] args)
Execute any command with the passed in arguments.

Parameters:
args - array of command you wish to execute.
Returns:
exit code of command executed.

getLastCommandOutput

java.lang.String getLastCommandOutput()
Returns the output captured during the last command executed.

Returns:
null if no command has been executed; the empty string if there was no output from the command

getLastCommandErrorMessage

java.lang.String getLastCommandErrorMessage()
Returns the error message captured during the last command executed.

Returns:
null if no command has been executed; the empty string if there was no error from the command
